text: Chronos is a super-villain named David Clinton from the DC Comics universe who has the ability to manipulate time, and is the arch-nemesis of The Atom. He was created by Gardner Fox and Gil Kane, first appearing in The Atom #3 (1962). Walker Gabriel was created by John Francis Moore and Paul Guinan, first appearing in Chronos #1 (1998). He has been a member of the Anti-Justice League, Crime Champions, Injustice Gang, Injustice League, Secret Society of Super-Villains, Suicide Squad, Time Foes and A.R.G.U.S.. His successor is a heroic time traveler named Walker Gabriel. Category:DC Comics supervillains
title: Chronos (character)
